sentence: Why did the nun take off her clothes? she had a bad habit
explanation: habit can refer to a regular practice or behavior, and also to the clothing worn by nuns
first_new_sentence: The doctor advised him to break his unhealthy eating habit.
second_new_sentence: The nun wore a traditional habit during the ceremony.
